org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations

Class InternalAggregation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.search.aggregations.InternalAggregation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Streamable, ToXContent, Aggregation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InternalFilters, InternalGeoHashGrid, InternalHistogram, InternalMetricsAggregation, InternalRange, InternalSignificantTerms, InternalSingleBucketAggregation, InternalTerms

    public abstract class InternalAggregation
extends Object
implements Aggregation, ToXContent, Streamable
    An internal implementation of Aggregation. Serves as a base class for all aggregation implementations.

      static class  InternalAggregation.Type
      The aggregation type that holds all the string types that are associated with an aggregation: name - used as the parser type stream - used as the stream type

      • reduce

        public abstract InternalAggregation reduce(InternalAggregation.ReduceContext reduceContext)
        Reduces the given addAggregation to a single one and returns it. In most cases, the assumption will be the all given addAggregation are of the same type (the same type as this aggregation). For best efficiency, when implementing, try reusing an existing get instance (typically the first in the given list) to save on redundant object construction.
